mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_stats_snapshots (user_id, snapshot_date, total_solved, solvedac_tier, solvedac_rating, solvedac_class) VALUES (#{userId}, #{snapshotDate}, #{totalSolved}, #{solvedacTier}, #{solvedacRating}, #{solvedacClass}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE total_solved = VALUES(total_solved), solvedac_tier = VALUES(solvedac_tier), solvedac_rating = VALUES(solvedac_rating), solvedac_class = VALUES(solvedac_class)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user_stats_snapshots WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND snapshot_date = #{snapshotDate}
SELECT * FROM user_stats_snapshots WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY snapshot_date DESC LIMIT 1
